Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the treatment and placement of incarcerated people based upon gender identity
Summary: Relates to the treatment and placement of incarcerated people based upon gender identity; requires that incarcerated people in state and local correctional facilities who have a gender identity different from the person's assigned sex at birth be addressed and have access to commissary items, clothing and other materials that are consistent with the person's gender identity; and establishes that incarcerated people shall be presumptively placed in a correctional facility with persons of the gender that most closely aligns with such person's gender identity unless the person opts out of such placement, such person is free to change their mind and switch at any time.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the treatment and placement of incarcerated people based upon gender identity
